content: **knitted dress in drops belle piece is knitted top down in stocking stitch with v-neck and straps size xs xxl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern vs-100 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** xs - s - m - l - xl - xxl **yarn** drops belle from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 400-450-500-550-600-650 g colour 21 almond rose **needles** drops circular needle size 4 mm length 60-60-60-80-80-80 cm **knitting gauge** 21 stitches in width and 28 row vertically in stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
